content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "How to turn a river into a lake" and received a list of URLs. I used the "browse_website" command to visit the website "https". Additionally, I executed the "execute_shell" command and installed several packages. The packages installed were "blt", "libtcl8.6", "libtk8.6", "python3-tk", and "tk8.6-blt2.5".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Environmental impact of turning a river into a lake"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.cnn.com/style/article/dyeing-pollution-fashion-intl-hnk-dst-sept/index.html", "https://www.nytimes.com/2022/06/07/climate/salt-lake-city-climate-disaster.html", "https://news.ucr.edu/articles/2022/10/06/why-salton-sea-turning-toxic-dust", "https://www.euronews.com/green/2022/06/09/utah-s-great-salt-lake-is-disappearing-and-it-could-turn-the-region-into-a-toxic-dust-bowl", "https://www.nrdc.org/stories/freshwater-harmful-algal-blooms-101", "https://www.euronews.com/green/2022/03/15/st-patrick-s-day-is-chicago-s-green-river-dyeing-tradition-bad-for-the-environment", "https://news.mongabay.com/2023/03/kenyan-science-interns-turn-lake-victorias-fish-waste-into-oil-and-flowers/", "https://www.worldwildlife.org/industries/freshwater-systems"]', type='action_result')]
"""
